title: Feasibility Analysis of MOOC Implementation in Indonesia: A Content-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience, basic digital literacy, foundational knowledge in pedagogy or social sciences
context.additional_context: Most learners primarily use smartphones as their main learning tool and have partially developed self-directed learning competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the compatibility of Indonesia’s education system with MOOCs across three dimensions
Learners can write reports evaluating MOOC adoption feasibility using content analysis methods
Learners can identify ≥5 barriers to self-directed learning in digital environments and propose alternatives

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
